soundEffects.title: Food Items Rustling
soundEffects.description: Shuffling food items inside the fridge.

soundEffects.title: Pantry Bag Crinkle
soundEffects.description: Crinkling of plastic or paper bags.

soundEffects.title: Boxes Shifting
soundEffects.description: Cardboard boxes being pushed and moved.

soundEffects.title: Egg Crack Too Hard
soundEffects.description: Egg cracking aggressively, shell breaking unevenly.

soundEffects.title: Pan Clank
soundEffects.description: Metal pan dropping onto the stove with force.

soundEffects.title: Loud Stirring
soundEffects.description: Metal spoon scraping against pan while stirring aggressively.

soundEffects.title: Plate Hitting Table
soundEffects.description: Ceramic plate placed onto table with an audible thud.

soundEffects.title: Phone Toss Onto Table
soundEffects.description: Phone being thrown onto table with slight bounce.
